Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Relatively \Rel"a*tive*ly\, adv. In a relative manner; in relation or respect to something else; not absolutely. [1913 Webster]
Consider the absolute affections of any being as it is in itself, before you consider it relatively. --I. Watts. [1913 Webster]
relatively adv : in a relative manner; by comparison to something else; "the situation is relatively calm now" [syn: {comparatively}]
